description:
Robust governance is essential to mitigate AI risks and maintain responsible systems, but the majority of firms are yet to implement a framework. Commissioned by Prove AI and conducted by Zogby Analytics, the report polled over 600 CEOs, CIOs, and CTOs from large companies across the US, UK, and Germany. The findings show that 96%... Read more »

The post AI governance gap: 95% of firms haven’t implemented frameworks appeared first on AI News.
title: AI governance gap: 95% of firms haven’t implemented frameworks
